nodes.text: The Right Place ... is an adventure scenario written by William Olmesdahl and published in The Politics of Contraband, a West End Games supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was published in September 1992 and reprinted in Classic Adventures Volume 1, published in 1995.
The story is set in the New Republic era, but before the Thrawn campaign: between 5 ABY and 9 ABY.

A pair of smugglers land on the planet Celanon, nearly broke, and they are looking for some employment. At the spaceport in Celanon City, the two are told that the best place to look for a job is at Gularg's Libation Emporium. Once they arrive at the bar, they have a few minor adventures with the local populace before being hired by Vohrkrewel Yahrkar, an infamous smuggler that is wanted by both the Galactic Empire and the Rebels. However, little do the newcomers realize that Yahrkar plans to have them act as a decoy so that he himself can get off the planet undetected and deliver a valuable cargo.
